ygData.msgSnippet: Owlhawk finished blowing up the asteroids and a Vok appeared in front of him. Vok:  You have proven yourself worthy to be emmisary of the Sarga. Take the Vok

Owlhawk finished blowing up the asteroids and a Vok appeared in front 
of him.

Vok:  You have proven yourself worthy to be emmisary of the Sarga.  
Take the Vok Destroyer.

A glowing light appears in his chest and he realizes he is being 
equiped with a new weapon.

Vok:  It will cause any Transformer's spark to slowly breakdown as 
spasm of pain become more and more common leading to death over 
several months.  It would effect a Vok in the same way as a spark if 
the Vok possessed a Transformer.

Owlhawk:  Like that other emmisary who wouldn't attack Megatron.

Vok:  No Meteara is different than Tigerhawk, the kind of Vok 
possessed bot I referred to is Tigerhawk.  One of your primary 
missions will be to kill Meteara, but the virus in the Vok destroyer 
will not do it.

Owlhawk:  Is there any cure?

Vok:  Just as you now hold death you also hold life.  Revesrse the 
weapons polarity.  Now go.

A light surrounds Owlhawk and he reappears at the Maximal base.

OOC: I know that was teleporting, but it's not like the char can do 
it at will.  Also where is Talos right now?
